title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on the Intergenerational Inquiry
purpose: The APPG bridges the generational divide by creating pathways into Westminster for young people, many of whom are currently disaffected, and guide them to contribute positively to policy and practice. Our parliamentary panels include lawyers, citizens, the medical profession. In this way young people, including students, experience participatory democracy.
